meanings.definition: Resembling a foot in shape or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The footlike shape of the cloud caught my attention.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar had a footlike appendage at the end of its body.
meanings.sent3: The footlike print left in the sand looked like a tiny footprint dance.
meanings.sent4: The footlike shadows of the trees stretched across the path.
meanings.sent5: The footlike pattern on the rug made it seem cozy and inviting.

meanings.definition: Having characteristics similar to those of a foot.
meanings.sent1: The footlike movements of the robot were fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent2: The footlike structure of the building provided stability in the storm.
meanings.sent3: The footlike squeak of the old door made it seem like it was talking.
meanings.sent4: The footlike rhythm of the drums echoed through the room.
meanings.sent5: The footlike grip of the monkey's hand surprised the zoo visitors.
